1.0.name: wordpress/slash-comments
1.0.description:
This plugin is now obsolete on account of the functionality being included with WordPress.

This plugin adds the slash:comments tag to RSS feeds, which tells feed readers such as Google Reader or Bloglines how many comments there currently are on that post.

A simple plugin, really. It evolved out of a Trac ticket that didn't get included into the WordPress core.
